argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | xmsusp.x | |- X = ( Base ` F ) |
| 2 |  | xmsusp.d | |- D = ( ( dist ` F ) |` ( X X. X ) ) |
| 3 |  | xmsusp.u | |- U = ( UnifSt ` F ) |
| 4 |  | #P_simp3 | |- ( ( X =/= (/) /\ F e. *MetSp /\ U = ( metUnif ` D ) ) -> U = ( metUnif ` D ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_simp1 | |- ( ( X =/= (/) /\ F e. *MetSp /\ U = ( metUnif ` D ) ) -> X =/= (/) ) |
| 6 | 1, 2 | #P_xmsxmet | |- ( F e. *MetSp -> D e. ( *Met ` X ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_3ad2ant2 | |- ( ( X =/= (/) /\ F e. *MetSp /\ U = ( metUnif ` D ) ) -> D e. ( *Met ` X ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_xmetpsmet | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> D e. ( PsMet ` X ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_metuust | |- ( ( X =/= (/) /\ D e. ( PsMet ` X ) ) -> ( metUnif ` D ) e. ( UnifOn ` X ) ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_sylan2 | |- ( ( X =/= (/) /\ D e. ( *Met ` X ) ) -> ( metUnif ` D ) e. ( UnifOn ` X ) ) |
| 11 | 5, 7, 10 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( X =/= (/) /\ F e. *MetSp /\ U = ( metUnif ` D ) ) -> ( metUnif ` D ) e. ( UnifOn ` X ) ) |
| 12 | 4, 11 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( ( X =/= (/) /\ F e. *MetSp /\ U = ( metUnif ` D ) ) -> U e. ( UnifOn ` X ) ) |
| 13 |  | #P_xmetutop | |- ( ( X =/= (/) /\ D e. ( *Met ` X ) ) -> ( unifTop ` ( metUnif ` D ) ) = ( MetOpen ` D ) ) |
| 14 | 5, 7, 13 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( X =/= (/) /\ F e. *MetSp /\ U = ( metUnif ` D ) ) -> ( unifTop ` ( metUnif ` D ) ) = ( MetOpen ` D ) ) |
| 15 | 4 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ( X =/= (/) /\ F e. *MetSp /\ U = ( metUnif ` D ) ) -> ( unifTop ` U ) = ( unifTop ` ( metUnif ` D ) ) ) |
| 16 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( TopOpen ` F ) = ( TopOpen ` F ) |
| 17 | 16, 1, 2 | #P_xmstopn | |- ( F e. *MetSp -> ( TopOpen ` F ) = ( MetOpen ` D ) ) |
| 18 | 17 | #P_3ad2ant2 | |- ( ( X =/= (/) /\ F e. *MetSp /\ U = ( metUnif ` D ) ) -> ( TopOpen ` F ) = ( MetOpen ` D ) ) |
| 19 | 14, 15, 18 | #P_3eqtr4rd | |- ( ( X =/= (/) /\ F e. *MetSp /\ U = ( metUnif ` D ) ) -> ( TopOpen ` F ) = ( unifTop ` U ) ) |
| 20 | 1, 3, 16 | #P_isusp | |- ( F e. UnifSp <-> ( U e. ( UnifOn ` X ) /\ ( TopOpen ` F ) = ( unifTop ` U ) ) ) |
| 21 | 12, 19, 20 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( ( X =/= (/) /\ F e. *MetSp /\ U = ( metUnif ` D ) ) -> F e. UnifSp ) |
